      • search

        public List<Client> search(ClientService.SearchType searchType,
                           String searchText)
        Search for clients based on the specified search type and search text
        Parameters:
        searchType - the type of search being performed
        searchText - the text to search for
        Returns:
        a list of clients which meet the search criteria; if none found null

        Returns:

      • find

        public Client find(String userName,
                   String password,
                   String salt)
        Find a client by username and password, used to check that a user can login
        Parameters:
        userName - the username to search by
        password - the password to search by
        salt - the salt used on the client's password
        Returns:
        the client found; if not found null
